subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Perfect weather, a lively crowd that nearly filled the stadium and a game-winning hit by Brendan Harris. The Tampa Bay Devil Rays got everything they needed for a successful debut at Disney World on Tuesday night.
snippet: Perfect weather, a lively crowd that nearly filled the stadium and a game-winning hit by Brendan Harris. The Tampa Bay Devil Rays got everything they needed for a successful debut at Disney World on Tuesday night.
